solution_line_template: Since the number of men and women is equal, then there are a total of {num_men} + {num_women} = <<{num_men}+{num_women}={total_men_women}>>{total_men_women} men and women.
Thus, {total_passengers} - {total_men_women} = <<{total_passengers}-{total_men_women}={num_children}>>{num_children} children are on the airplane.
